info: KaEnn is an acronym and, in the same time, pseudonym of Krzysztof Nowakowski - abstract ambient/electronic music composer from Poland. He was connected with demoscene in the early 1990s writing his pieces at Amiga with Protracker. Most of KaEnnâ€™s creative activity focuses on deep philosophical meanings of existence (Czekam), as well as astral projections and out of body experiences (Wyklad, Dziwny Sen).
